title: Off-Season Fantasy News For Your Drafts
description:
Field Yates, Mike Clay and Daniel Dopp take a look at the biggest off-season moves including trades, rookies drafted and free agent signings that will impact your fantasy drafts. Plus, advice on how you should approach the 1st Round in your league.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
